caption.p: Candidate models of maneuvering performance. All models include an intercept as well as a random effect of bird identity to account for repeated measures of individuals.

tr.td: Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + wing length
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + wing aspect ratio
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + wing length + wing aspect ratio
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + weight lifted
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + weight lifted + wing length
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + weight lifted + wing aspect ratio
Solo/comp + experiment + body mass + weight lifted + wing length + wing aspect ratio

fn.p: *Candidate models 1-7 also include a fixed effect of days post-capture for the following metrics: Velmax, AccHormax, DecHormax, Arcvel, avg, and Arccent, max
